评论概述: Great statement piece. On the thinner side.
评论详情: This exceeded my expectations, it’s really cute on, especially with a dress. It’s a bit oversized, and the small fit me nicely without being fitted (I’m 5’6”/120lb/32DD) This isn’t so much a jacket as it is like a western style blazer (but with less structure, it just hangs like a shirt). It’s relatively thin and would not keep you warmer than a blazer. But that’s OK, it’s for fashion and it serves its purpose. It’s also super, super soft and comfortable. Like unexpectedly cozy. I’m looking forward to wearing it for a girls night out or a date.
